text: (napiye!) Umakku mun vanta tutarkalukkuk kurappattatu etuvo, atait tavira (veronrum putitaka) umakkuk kurappatavillai. (Akave, ivarkal kurum nintanaikalaip parri nir kavalaippatatir.) Niccayamaka umatu iraivan (nallavarkalukku) mika mannipputaiyavan, (tiyavarkalukku) tunpuruttum vetanaiyutaiyavan
